meanings.definition: Resembling a wart in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The rough, wartlike growth on the tree bark stood out.
meanings.sent2: Her skin had a few small, wartlike bumps that she wanted to get rid of.
meanings.sent3: The wartlike spot on the banana made it look like a tiny mountain.
meanings.sent4: The wartlike protrusions on the rock surface added an interesting texture.
meanings.sent5: The wartlike growth on the pumpkin was bumpy and uneven.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a wart.
meanings.sent1: The wartlike growth was small and raised on the skin.
meanings.sent2: The toad had a wartlike bump on its back.
meanings.sent3: The wartlike feature on the toy made it look funny.
meanings.sent4: Her wartlike laugh echoed through the room.
meanings.sent5: The wartlike texture of the rock felt rough to the touch.
